title: ThemePen
author: ThemePen
content: Apri FoolGood morning guys..I was surprised when I see the Captcha Before Posting. But when I saw the date so it was the April Fool day. And theymos always try to introduce something funny to all. It is a little bit fun. I don't know how much time it will remain. I think it is only for 24h. I passed my first captcha by playing game in 2 minutes.By the way nice game theymos.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Even though there's no warning message under your account, I think you're still a spammer because you're creating a new thread where there's already 2 existing discussions about April Fools' day. Edit:Quote from: shahzadafzal on April 01, 2023, 02:02:14 AMI guess theymos forgot to add the CAPTCHA on creating a NEW thread???Nope, there's a requirement to complete the Captcha on creating a new thread, you can try it yourself.

comments.author: xhomerx10
comments.body: Finally found a thread I could solve the captcha in yet I have nothing to say (as usual).¬†¬†Nice one, theymos! ¬†edit: still tagged as a spammer even though I solved it.¬† Just solved it again in the edit as a test.

comments.author: shahzadafzal
comments.body: I guess theymos forgot to add the CAPTCHA on creating a NEW thread???

comments.author: Ryker1
comments.body: What else?This is what I got too which I think is impossible. [I quoted his post but don't see the text I have seen, I checked his profile but he is not a spammer] until I realize that today is April Fool's day. I don't believe Darker45 is a spammer which makes me confused and until I said to myself, ohh , what month is today?

comments.author: John Abraham
comments.body: Well, you don't have to ruin everything. Let everyone enjoy this day. Why are you guys so savage? I saw other people's as well doing such a thing as. I didn't get the point of doing such as you also know it's part of the day. If you can't make someone happy, don't be a reason for someone's sadness. I am sure theymos won't be sad because of that. It will encourage him to do something more unique next year. Still, why are you guys doing it?

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: New Bitcointalk Captcha Solving course coming out soon!Most unfortunately, somebody replied before I could hit post, and that reset my counter.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: shahzadafzal on April 01, 2023, 02:02:14 AMI guess theymos forgot to add the CAPTCHA on creating a NEW thread???There is still a Captcha to solve if you create a new thread but the good thing is that you will have to get minimum coins in order to create a thread and hence its a loop hole to prove that you are not a spammer. By the way, everyone is talking about the captcha, what about the coins we collect while solving the captcha? Are these coins worth holding ? Are these coins bitcoin killer ?

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Omg, I was just lurking around some boards and got shocked when I saw the red colored suspected spammer statement across many members posts. Thought everyone became a spammer or the forum got hacked. Huh! Nice one theymos!Happy april fool everyone Edit: Woops, I shouldnt have posted today, now Im also a suspected spammer

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.created_time: April 01, 2023, 05:21:17 AMLast edit: December 16, 2023, 06:36:13 PM by Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Knowing already that the solve captcha thing before clicking the post button was another April fool from the boss himself (theymos), I by-passed it, I went ahead to click the post button after I was done typing my message, an then, I ended up getting this "this user is a suspected spammer"  at the header of my posts üòÇ..This will freak out newbies who are seeing their first April 1st on this forum, they likely would think this is a new development üòÅ, theymos please take it easy..

comments.author: Maslate
comments.body: I was surprised when I logged into my account and saw the 'suspected spammer' tag on me. Then I remembered it's April Fools' Day. I have to admit, I fell for it and thought it was true. Haha!Anyway, Happy April Fools Day everyone.

comments.author: pawanjain
comments.body: This is my first post today on April fools day. Fortunately, this time I remembered it was April fools day and Theymos would definitely come up with something just like every year.So this time it's tagging the users as a spammer hah. Nice one. Lets see if I get tagged for this post.Edit: I was able to solve the captcha. Nice game though.
